summary: Hyperscalers are aggressively increasing AI infrastructure investments, with Meta raising 2024 Capex guidance to $35-40B, Google and Microsoft emphasizing AI-driven cloud growth, and AWS accelerating GPU deployment. GPU rental prices remain stable at premium levels ($3.14/hr) due to sustained demand. Anticipation for GPT-5 (2025) and Gemini 2 releases further fuels market optimism.
